column5: Just letting anybody in the area know about the Rock Lake Ice Fishing Challenge this weekend. It's a small derby, so it's great for the kids. Entry fee is $60.00cnd. and top prize is $5000.00. Plus about 30 other prizes and door prizes. The derby starts at 11am and goes till 2pm. Gates open up at 9am. You can call 204-325-5730 for more info.P.S. Rock Lake is about 2 hours southwest of Winnipeg.
